titleStmt.title: A short discovery of the mystery of iniquitie. To which is added also, a brief discovery of the falso holinesse of nations, their instituted or church state, and what appertains thereunto: set forth for the good of all that love truth in the inward parts. / By Mich: Quintyne.
titleStmt.author: Quintyne, Michael.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "A fayned Independant"; "Octob. 27".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
